div.p: The DeviceRequest and DeviceNotRequested profiles represent the positive and negative statements for a device request.
The following example illustrates accessing DeviceRequest not requested data:

pre.code: define "Venous Foot Pumps Not Ordered": [ DeviceNotRequested: "Venous Foot Pumps (VFP)"] DeviceNotOrdered where (DeviceNotOrdered.doNotPerformReason in "Medical Reason" or DeviceNotOrdered.doNotPerformReason in "Patient Refusal")

tr.td: Device not indicated; indicates that none of the devices in the given "not done value set" were requested.
Device not indicated; indicates that a specific device, by code, was not requested.

div.p: For a more complete discussion of representation of negation within QICore and quality improvement artifacts, see the Negation in QI Core topic.
